SELECT ld.* FROM ( SELECT s.name, s.campusId AS campusId, s.createDate AS createDate, IFNULL(MAX(ld.score),90)AS score FROM StudentInfo s LEFT JOIN LessonInfo l ON l.studentId=s.id AND l.subject=1 LEFT JOIN LessonDetail ld ON ld.lessonId=l.id GROUP BY s.name, s.campusId,
s.createDate )ld WHERE ld.campusId=#{campusId} ORDER BY ld.score DESC LIMIT 0,10

select t1.*,t4.name coachName,t3.path,t2.id loginId,t2.roleId,t2.username,t2.email,t2.lastLoginTime,t2.lastLoginIP,t2.status from StudentInfo t1 left join Login t2 on t2.userId=t1.id left join Picture t3 on t1.photoId = t3.id left join CoachInfo t4 on t4.id = t1.coachId where t1.id = #{id} and t2.roleType=1 order by t1.createDate desc

SELECT s.name stuname, s.sex, s.licenceCode, s.phone, s.address, s.id stuId, lo.roleId, p.path, c.title school, h.name coachname, h.id coachId, d.title DrivingLicenceType, (SELECT COUNT(*)AS 'count' FROM LessonInfo l WHERE l.`stuId`=s.`id` AND l.`status` = 1 AND l.`beginTime`>=SYSDATE()) AS lessonInfocount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `TestInfo` t WHERE t.`stuId`=s.`id` AND t.studyDate >=SYSDATE()) AS Testcount FROM StudentInfo s LEFT JOIN Login lo ON lo.userId = s.id LEFT JOIN Picture p ON s.photoId = p.id LEFT JOIN CampusInfo c ON s.campusId = c.id LEFT JOIN CoachInfo h ON s.coachId = h.id LEFT JOIN DrivingLicence d ON s.licenceId=d.id WHERE s.id =#{id} AND lo.roleType = 1 ORDER BY s.createDate DESC
select path from (select t1.photoId from StudentInfo t1 where t1.id = #{id}) t2 left join Picture t3 on t2.photoId = t3.id

WHERE s.name LIKE CONCAT("%", #{conditions.keyWord}, "%") OR s.forShort LIKE CONCAT("%", #{conditions.keyWord}, "%") OR s.stuCode LIKE CONCAT("%", #{conditions.keyWord}, "%") OR s.phone LIKE CONCAT("%", #{conditions.keyWord}, "%")
ORDER BY s.createDate DESC
